name: UE4 - FroidLand
description:
This is my firt game made with UE4.

In this adventure you have to collect all hammers in a limit of time to reach next area, but be careful there are dangers that will stalk you.

Assets: Infinity Blade Grasslands

Sounds:  https://freesound.org/

Music Rights:

Chrono Cross OST - Dream Fragments

Chrono Cross OST - Havel of the World

Chrono Cross OST - Dead Sea

Metin2 - Theme

FFX - Seymours Theme

SAO - Theme
